interface.name: zcompositor_manager_v1

description.summary: information about windows and arranging windows

interface.description: Clients can use this interface to receive information such as title and PID of windows. They can also use it to position and resize windows.

request.name: get_window_info

description.summary: provides information about a window

request.description: The window_info event is sent after the creation of a window and any changes of the information of a window.

request.name: set_window_area

description.summary: set the area a surface should cover

request.description: Sets the position and size of a surface.

request.name: raise_window

description.summary: raises a window to the top

request.description: Raises a window to the top.

request.name: destroy

description.summary: delete this object, used or not

request.description:
Unreferences the compositor manager. This request must be called as soon as it's no longer used.
It can be called at any time by the client. The client will still have to close any FDs it has been given.

interface.name: zcompositor_v1

description.summary: a compositor with information about windows

interface.description: This object represents a compositor with information about windows.

event.name: window_info

description.summary: provides information about a window

event.description: The window_info event is sent after the creation of a window and any changes of the information of a window.

arg.name: pid
arg.summary: the PID of the application the window belongs to

event.name: done

description.summary: all information about the windows have been sent

event.description: This event is sent after information about all current windows or changes have been sent.

request.name: destroy

description.summary: delete this object, used or not

request.description:
Unreferences the frame. This request must be called as soon as its no longer used.
It can be called at any time by the client. The client will still have to close any FDs it has been given.

interface.name: zinput_device_seat_mapper_v1

description.summary: a input device seat mapper that maps input devices to seats

interface.description: This object represents an input device mapper that can map input devices to a specific seat.

request.name: register_input_device

description.summary: registers an input device name to be mapped to a seat

request.description: Registers an input device name to be mapped to a seat with a given index. Has to be called before device is created.

request.name: destroy

description.summary: delete this object, used or not

request.description:
Unreferences the input device mapper. This request must be called as soon as its no longer used.
It can be called at any time by the client. The client will still have to close any FDs it has been given.

interface.name: zwindow_capture_manager_v1

description.summary: capture frames for specific windows

interface.description: Clients can use this interface to capture frames from specific windows.

request.name: copy_window_frame

description.summary: copies a frame for a window to specified buffer

request.description: The done event is sent after the window frame has been copied.

arg.name: wait_for_next_frame
arg.summary: waits for next frame if non zero

request.name: destroy

description.summary: delete this object, used or not

request.description:
Unreferences the window capture manager. This request must be called as soon as it's no longer used.
It can be called at any time by the client. The client will still have to close any FDs it has been given.

interface.name: zwindow_dmabuf_frame_v1

description.summary: a DMA-BUF frame

interface.description:
This object represents a single DMA-BUF frame.
If the capture failed, the "cancel" event is sent. This can happen anytime before the "done" event.
Once either a "done" or a "cancel" event is received, the client should destroy the frame. Once an "object" event is received, the client is responsible for closing the associated file descriptor.

event.name: done

description.summary: indicates frame is has been copied

event.description: This event is sent after after frame has been copied to buffer.

enum.name: cancel_reason

description.summary: cancel reason

enum.description: Indicates reason for cancelling the frame.

entry.name: temporary
entry.summary: temporary error, source will produce more frames

entry.name: permanent
entry.summary: fatal error, source will not produce frames

entry.name: resizing
entry.summary: temporary error, source will produce more frames

event.name: cancel

description.summary: indicates the frame is no longer valid

event.description:
If the capture failed or if the frame is no longer valid after the "frame" event has been emitted, this event will be used to inform the client to scrap the frame.
If the failure is temporary, the client may capture again the same source. If the failure is permanent, any further attempts to capture the same source will fail again.
After receiving this event, the client should destroy this object.

arg.name: reason
arg.summary: indicates a reason for cancelling this frame capture

request.name: destroy

description.summary: delete this object, used or not

request.description:
Unreferences the frame. This request must be called as soon as its no longer used.
It can be called at any time by the client. The client will still have to close any FDs it has been given.
